ExportResources.name: Ferment Bladder
ExportResources.description:
Many Deimos fish secrete reagents in a pouchlike organ, creating volatile gases that enable limited periods of levitation. 

Guaranteed to drop from these sources:
OSTIMYR
AQUAPULMO
VITREOSPINA
CRYPTOSUCTUS
BARBISTEO
KYMAEROS
AMNIOPHYSI
GLUTINOX

ExportResources.name: Tubercular Gill System
ExportResources.description:
Adaptive membranes allow many Deimos fish to move freely between fluid and gaseous environments.

Guaranteed to drop from these sources:
OSTIMYR
AQUAPULMO
VITREOSPINA
MYXOSTOMATA
DUROID

ExportResources.name: Benign Infested Tumor
ExportResources.description:
The Infestation infects all fish on Deimos, even those that do not show any external mutations.

Guaranteed to drop from all fish on Deimos.

ExportResources.name: Pustulent Cognitive Nodule
ExportResources.description:
The Infestation provokes the growth of multiple, seemingly redundant brain-like clusters, whose function may be linked to hivemind activity. 

Guaranteed to drop from these sources:
AQUAPULMO
CRYPTOSUCTUS

ExportResources.name: Dendrite Blastoma
ExportResources.description:
Elements of other lifeforms are detectable in Infested body parts, such as this apparently parasitic clump of land-dwelling animal tissue.

Guaranteed to drop from these sources:
VITREOSPINA
BARBISTEO

ExportResources.name: Saturated Muscle Mass
ExportResources.description:
Environmental contamination is co-responsible for mutations, alongside Infested cellular alteration.

Guaranteed to drop from these sources:
OSTIMYR
KYMAEROS

ExportResources.name: Waxen Sebum Deposit
ExportResources.description:
Remnants of creatures' original bodily fluids persist post-Infestation, often crystalized or congealed into entirely new compounds.

Source:
AMNIOPHYSI

ExportResources.name: Sporulate Sac
ExportResources.description:
These pressurized repositories of Infested spores require careful extraction or explosive rupture and local contamination may occur.

Source:
GLUTINOX

ExportResources.name: Ocular Stem-Root
ExportResources.description:
The organs that once served as eyes, prior to Infestation, are still replete with useful components.

Source:
FLAGELLOCANTH

ExportResources.name: Parasitic Tethermaw
ExportResources.description:
Used to latch on to other life forms for feeding purposes, and to inject them with anticoagulants and sporelets.

Source:
LOBOTRISCID

ExportResources.name: Biotic Filter
ExportResources.description:
Sifting the glutinous Exocrine is an essential part of the survival process, and a reminder of the creature's original function.

Guaranteed to drop from these sources:
AQUAPULMO
DUROID

ExportResources.name: Spinal Core Section
ExportResources.description:
Many delicate and complex nerve fibers are housed in the jointed vertebrae, which are one of the creature's most resilient parts. Found from Vitreospina fish known to eke out a primitive existence in cave systems.

Guaranteed to drop from these sources:
VITREOSPINA
CHONDRICORD

ExportResources.name: Cranial Foremount
ExportResources.description:
Beneath the membranous protein layers can be found a secondary 'skull'; flexible, tough and highly conductive.

Source:
MYXOSTOMATA

ExportResources.description: Plant-based materials of all kinds are processed and liquidized within the Helminth's digestive tract; the surplus is excreted as an inoffensive, inert clump.

ExportResources.name: Calx
ExportResources.description: On consuming minerals, Helminth converts those it does not fully absorb into a smooth, rich paste with a faint vanilla odor.

ExportResources.name: Oxides
ExportResources.description: Metallic substances, steadily corroded by the Helminth's digestive juices and exuded as a coarse powder.

ExportResources.name: Pheromones
ExportResources.description: When Helminth consumes Infested matter it creates greasy intestine-like casings, bloats them with a dark, musky gas and ejects them. The reason for this is unknown and probably best left that way.

ExportResources.name: Synthetics
ExportResources.description: Helminth eagerly consumes artificial materials and exudes these rope-like strands of filament as a useful byproduct.

ExportResources.name: Nitain Extract
ExportResources.description:
Each vial is produced by the painstaking expression of billions of rare, ocean-vent dwelling microorganisms.

This resource can be acquired from Nightwave offerings.

ExportResources.name: Alloy Plate
ExportResources.description:
Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.

Locations: Venus, Phobos, Ceres, Jupiter, Pluto, and Sedna.

ExportResources.name: Alpha Corruptor
ExportResources.description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Beta counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Beta Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

ExportResources.name: Zealot Derelict Code
ExportResources.description: Allows access to Infested Derelicts that have been rerouted to populated areas by Zealots.

ExportResources.name: Vista Suite Key
ExportResources.description: Opens the Dormizone's luxurious Vista Suite where residents can enjoy Vistagraphs and Audioscapes.

ExportResources.name: Orokin Archive
ExportResources.description: Archive detailing the locations of hidden Archwing technology

ExportResources.name: Argon Crystal
ExportResources.description:
A Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the Void.

This resource can be found in the Void.

ExportResources.name: Proof Fragment
ExportResources.description: One part of a long lost mathematical proof.

ExportResources.name: Beta Corruptor
ExportResources.description: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Alpha counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Alpha Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.

ExportResources.name: Circuits
ExportResources.description:
Various electronic components.

Locations: Venus, Ceres, and the Kuva Fortress.

ExportResources.name: Clan Creator
ExportResources.description: [PH] Clan Creator Description

ExportResources.name: Hexenon
ExportResources.description: A reagent commonly used to produce highly combustible fuel.

ExportResources.name: Control Module
ExportResources.description:
Autonomy processor for Robotics. A Corpus design.

Locations: Europa, Neptune, and the Void.

ExportResources.name: Cryotic
ExportResources.description:
Usually found in extreme sub-zero environments, Cryotic instantly freezes anything it contacts.

Locations: Excavation Missions on Venus, Earth, Phobos, Europa, and Neptune.

ExportResources.name: additional appearance config slot for this item
ExportResources.description: Unlocks an additional appearance config slot for this item, up to a maximum of 3 extra slots.

ExportResources.name: Simulacrum Access Key
ExportResources.description:
Grants access to the Simulacrum.

In the Simulacrum you can face mimeographs of enemies you have fully researched with the Codex.

ExportResources.name: Tethra Data Fragments
ExportResources.description: Intercepted encrypted fragment of Grineer communications.

ExportResources.name: Breath of the Eidolon
ExportResources.description: A gas found solely on the plains of Eidolon, refined to its purest form.

ExportResources.name: Vitus Essence
ExportResources.description: Awarded by the Arbiters of Hexis to few Tenno capable of surviving Arbitration.

ExportResources.name: Synthula
ExportResources.description: Distilled fuel for stims.

ExportResources.name: Ferrite
ExportResources.description:
Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.

Locations: Mercury, Earth, Lua, Neptune, and the Void.

ExportResources.name: Diluted Thermia
ExportResources.description: A magma like liquid that is diluted with coolant during the extraction process. Thermia can be found fracturing the surface of the Orb Vallis during thermal flare-ups. Could this be the key to weakening the Exploiter Orb's defenses?

ExportResources.name: Greater Focus Lens
ExportResources.description: A Greater Lens that channels Affinity into Focus for one of the five Tenno Ways.

ExportResources.name: Lua Lens
ExportResources.description: An Eidolon Lens enhanced with resonance from Somatic Fibers.

ExportResources.name: Eidolon Lens
ExportResources.description: An enhanced Greater Lens that has been infused with Breath of the Eidolon.

ExportResources.name: Forma
ExportResources.description: This shape-altering component is fundamental to Orokin construction. Allows you to change the polarity of a mod slot on a Warframe, Companions or Weapon and then resets their affinity to Unranked. This can only be used on max Rank Warframes, Companions and Weapons.

ExportResources.name: Aura Forma
ExportResources.description: Modifies an Aura slot on a Warframe to be compatible with any Mod Polarity.

ExportResources.name: TEST FORMA
ExportResources.description: /Lotus/Language/Consumables/FormaOmegaDesc

ExportResources.name: Stance Forma
ExportResources.description: Modifies a Stance slot on a melee weapon to be compatible with any Mod Polarity.

ExportResources.name: Umbra Forma
ExportResources.description:
Forma that can apply the UMBRA polarity.

This shape-altering component is fundamental to Orokin construction. Allows you to change the polarity of a mod slot on a Warframe or Melee Weapon to UMBRA polarity and then resets their affinity to Unranked. This can only be used on max Rank Warframes and Melee Weapons.

ExportResources.name: Gallium
ExportResources.description:
Soft metal used in microelectronics and energy weapons.

Locations: Mars and Uranus.

ExportResources.name: Corrupted Holokey
ExportResources.description: A corrupted decryption key dating back to the founding of the city of Corposium. Millions of these Holokeys were lost to the Void when Parvos Granum's flagship was bombed. Strongly desired by Ergo Glast.

ExportResources.name: Javlok Capacitor
ExportResources.description: Used in the construction of Javloks

ExportResources.name: Gravimag
ExportResources.description:
Allows archwing guns to be deployed in terrestrial zones. Install this device on archwing guns to compensate for atmospheric and gravitational forces not experienced in space.
NOTE: Deployment requires gear obtained from the Profit-Taker mission in Fortuna.

ExportResources.name: Vay Hek Nav Coordinate
ExportResources.description: Coordinate used to locate Councilor Vay Hek.

ExportResources.name: Mutalist Alad V Nav Coordinate
ExportResources.description:
These coordinates can be used to track Mutalist Alad V.

Can be acquired from Infestation Outbreaks & Deimos.

ExportResources.name: RUSH REPAIR DRONE
ExportResources.description: This single-use item instantly repairs a damaged component or armament in the Dry Dock.

ExportResources.name: Pulsating Tubercles
ExportResources.description: A grizzly trophy extracted from the corpse of a Juggernaut.

ExportResources.name: Infected Palpators
ExportResources.description: A grizzly trophy extracted from the corpse of a Juggernaut.

ExportResources.name: Chitinous Husk
ExportResources.description: A grizzly trophy extracted from the corpse of a Juggernaut.

ExportResources.name: Severed Bile Sac
ExportResources.description: A grizzly trophy extracted from the corpse of a Juggernaut.

ExportResources.name: Judgement Points
ExportResources.description: Points earned through victories in Rathuum.

ExportResources.name: Kuva
ExportResources.description:
A mysterious red fluid coveted by the Grineer Queens.

Obtained in Kuva missions.

ExportResources.name: Cross-Matrix Widget
ExportResources.description: Chance for each scan with the Synthesis Scanner to count as two scans.

ExportResources.name: Data-Parse Widget
ExportResources.description: Synthesis Scanner will now show target enemy weaknesses and resistances.

ExportResources.name: Sol-Battery Widget
ExportResources.description: Recharges Synthesis Scanner charges.

ExportResources.name: Vector-Thread Widget
ExportResources.description: Reduces the time required to scan a target with the Synthesis Scanner.

ExportResources.name: Phasic Cells
ExportResources.description: Harvested from the debris left by fallen Orphix Sentients, Phasic Cells seem to be key to pulse function. These components can be traded with Father in the Necralisk.

ExportResources.name: Somatic Fibers
ExportResources.description:
Neural fibers sampled from an early Warframe prototype and preserved in a stabilized cerebral fluid.

Drops from Demolishers on Lua.

ExportResources.name: Orokin Cipher
ExportResources.description:
This device is used to bypass Orokin encryptions.

Location: Orokin Derelict Vaults

ExportResources.name: additional mod config slot for this item
ExportResources.description: Unlocks an additional appearance config slot for this item, up to a maximum of 3 extra slots.

ExportResources.name: Morphics
ExportResources.description:
An amorphous solid. Possibly Orokin technology.

Locations: Mercury, Mars, Phobos, Europa, and Pluto.

ExportResources.name: Nano Spores
ExportResources.description:
Fibrous technocyte tumour. Handle Infested tissue with caution.

Locations: Saturn, Neptune, Eris, and Deimos.

ExportResources.name: Narmer Isoplast
ExportResources.description: An adaptive Sentient base component responsible for communication flows. Used extensively in the Narmer invasion. A valuable commodity for both The Quills and Vox Solaris.

ExportResources.name: Nav Coordinate
ExportResources.description:
Coordinate used to locate lost ships.

Can be acquired from Storage Containers.

ExportResources.name: Neural Sensors
ExportResources.description:
Implanted neural-link for controlling augmentations. Grineer design.

Location: Jupiter

ExportResources.name: Neurodes
ExportResources.description:
Biotech sensor organ harvested from Infested entities.

Locations: Earth, Lua, Eris, and Deimos.

ExportResources.description: Install this segment in order to enable the Arsenal within your orbiter.

ExportResources.name: Archwing Launcher Segment

ExportResources.name: AUXILIARY FORMA CRUCIBLE
ExportResources.description: A foundry upgrade that allows two Forma to be crafted at the same time.

ExportResources.name: Landing Craft Foundry Segment
ExportResources.description:
Upgrades the Orbiter's Foundry with the following features:

- Allows construction of Landing Craft
- Allows construction of Air Support Charges

Equip Air Support Charges in your Loadout's Gear.

ExportResources.name: Kavat Incubator Upgrade Segment
ExportResources.description: Allows the Incubator to breed Kavats.

ExportResources.name: Incubator Segment
ExportResources.description: Install this segment to enable the pet incubator within your Orbiter.

ExportResources.name: Nutrio Incubator Upgrade Segment
ExportResources.description:
Upgrades the Orbiter's Incubator with the following features:

- Regress genetic aging of mature companions
- Egg incubation reduced by a day

ExportResources.name: HELMINTH SEGMENT
ExportResources.description: Empower the Helminth in your Orbiter and unlock the transfer of new abilities to your Warframes.

ExportResources.name: HELMINTH INVIGORATION SEGMENT
ExportResources.description: Allows The Helminth to inject a Warframe with an Invigoration. Invigorations temporarily increase a Warframe's capabilities.

ExportResources.name: Mod Fusion Segment
ExportResources.description: Install this segment to enable the Mod Fusion function within the MODS terminal of your Orbiter.

ExportResources.name: TRAINING DEBT-BOND
ExportResources.description: The Taxmen call it an investment in our future, but loans to cover vocational and specialist training almost always cost more than you'll ever earn. Especially with the interest.

ExportResources.name: SHELTER DEBT-BOND
ExportResources.description: Covers everything from hab rent to insurance, docking permits and paying off that rail tractor. Big ticket items.

ExportResources.name: MEDICAL DEBT-BOND
ExportResources.description: To get work you need mods. Then you need more work to pay for the mods, so you get more mods. And here we are.

ExportResources.name: ADVANCES DEBT-BOND
ExportResources.description: Sometimes a rig jockey needs a helping hand, so they get an advance on the next pay. Massive interest rates almost guarantee they'll be paying that off forever.

ExportResources.name: FAMILIAL DEBT-BOND
ExportResources.description: Debts unpaid by one generation are passed to the next. Working to pay them off is seen as something to be proud of. What choice do they have?
